ygData.subject: More about twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Most people think camping is no fun.  I d much rather move around and fight different things.  As for how the game was meant to be played....  Well, that
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>
> and if a friend offered me serpentine bracers and an exe hood i wouldn't
> take em. I don't need em at my level and when I get to the appropriate
> level i want to go camp for them....it's how the game was meant to be
> played and until they change the whole camping system I will continue to
> play it in that fashion. Twinkers like you already screwed the
> PoF.....whats next....Lower Guk...permafrost.....

Most people think camping is no fun. I'd much rather move around and fight
different things. As for how the game was meant to be played.... Well,
that speaks for itself.

Think of that every time you get into a car, or a plane, or a boat. You are
equipped with boots or shoes or bare feet (maybe high heels, you never
know). If you were "meant" to travel any other way than walking or running,
you'd have wings, flippers, or wheels.

The idea that something must be done the way it was "meant" to be done is
plain silly. If we all thought that way, we'd all be living in the trees
still and not speaking or writing, but that's not the way it's "supposed" to
be.

Kaelrei
